User.name: John Doe
User.symptoms: I have a rash on my penis

diagnoses.name: Possible Yeast Infection or STI
diagnoses.explanation: A rash on the penis can be caused by a yeast infection, bacterial STI, or viral STI. It's essential to consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.
causes: Sexual contact with an infected person
recommendations: Schedule an appointment with a healthcare professional
Wash the area with soap and water
diagnoses.next_steps: Seek medical attention and adhere to follow-up appointments.

message: A message to the user that their information has been processed and a ticket has been created.
summary: Your concern about a rash on your penis has been acknowledged. A possible diagnosis is a yeast infection or an STI, which requires medical attention. We recommend scheduling an appointment with a healthcare professional and following proper hygiene practices. Please ensure to note any potential treatments and follow-up appointments to ensure proper treatment.
